sn35.114:4.1: * “Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.114:4.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati—
sn35.114:4.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āvāsagato mārassa, mārassa vasaṃ gato, paṭimukkassa mārapāso.
sn35.114:4.4: Baddho so mārabandhanena yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato … pe ….
sn35.114:5.1: Santi, bhikkhave, jivhāviññeyyā rasā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.114:5.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati—
sn35.114:5.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āvāsagato mārassa, mārassa vasaṃ gato, paṭimukkassa mārapāso.
sn35.114:6.1: Santi, bhikkhave, manoviññeyyā dhammā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.114:6.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati—
sn35.114:6.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āvāsagato mārassa, mārassa vasaṃ gato, paṭimukkassa mārapāso.
sn35.114:6.4: Baddho so mārabandhanena yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato … pe …
sn35.114:7.1: Santi ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.114:7.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati—
sn35.114:7.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nāvāsagato mārassa, na mārassa vasaṃ gato, ummukkassa mārapāso.
sn35.114:7.4: Mutto so mārabandhanena na yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato … pe ….
sn35.114:8.1: Santi, bhikkhave, jivhāviññeyyā rasā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.114:8.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati—
sn35.114:8.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nāvāsagato mārassa, na mārassa vasaṃ gato, ummukkassa mārapāso.
sn35.114:8.4: Mutto so mārabandhanena na yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato … pe ….
sn35.114:9.1: Santi, bhikkhave, manoviññeyyā dhammā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.114:9.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati—
sn35.114:9.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nāvāsagato mārassa, na mārassa vasaṃ gato, ummukkassa mārapāso.
sn35.114:9.4: Mutto so mārabandhanena na yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato”ti.
